meanings.sent2: She waved and said tata as she left.
meanings.sent3: After finishing the game, he jokingly shouted tata to his opponent.
meanings.sent4: As the train departed, he whispered tata to the passing scenery.
meanings.sent5: The old man smiled and bid tata to his long-time friend.

meanings.sent1: My tata is a hardworking man.
meanings.sent2: He asked his tata for advice on fixing the car.
meanings.sent3: The little girl proudly introduced her tata to her friends.
meanings.sent4: His tata was a pillar of strength in the family.
meanings.sent5: Every Sunday, the family gathered around their tata for stories.

meanings.definition: A young child's word for father
meanings.sent1: The toddler ran to his tata for a hug.
meanings.sent2: She called out for her tata when she woke up from a nap.
meanings.sent3: The little boy proudly showed his drawing to his tata.
meanings.sent4: In the park, the children played with their tata.
meanings.sent5: The young girl's face lit up when she saw her tata coming home.
